definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: In chapter two, describes hardware system design of the network-stye instrument bus.
sentences.chinese: 第二章闡述網絡式儀器總線硬件平臺的設計。

sentences.english: The hardware platform of low-power consumption is designed with the low-power consumption MCU (Microprogrammed Control Unit) as the hardware core.
sentences.chinese: 以微功耗單片機爲硬件核心，設計了低功耗硬件平臺。

sentences.english: Two development boards based on ARM have been designed in the hardware platform.
sentences.chinese: 硬件平臺設計了兩塊基於ARM的開發板。
